other_tests.findings: Severe acute interstitial nephritis with extensive interstitial inflammation, many eosinophils, extensive degenerative changes of tubular cells, and thin glomerular basement membranes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Post-biopsy treatment with glucocorticoids resulted in improvement of creatinine levels, returning to baseline over the following three years with no recurrence of acute tubulointerstitial nephritis.

other_tests.findings: Two chronic gastric ulcers with adherent clot at the ulcer base, erosive gastritis without evidence of dysplasia or infection.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up endoscopic examinations confirmed healing of the gastric ulcers.
